title: Where was the decision made to not issue parachutes to AEF pilots in World War 1? Are there any primary sources available to support this decision? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think near the end some used them. The British ass-brass thought it would promote cowardice and would rather have you burn or fall or shoot yourself. The same men who sent hundreds of thousands to their deaths frontally assaulting maxim guns for most of the war.
